content: ♥ welcome to loopy handmade crochet pattern loopy soap sack english us standard crochet terms level easy the loopy soap sack is an easy crochet pattern and works up fast simply slip a bar of soap into the pouch and use it as a washcloth the soft dense texture of this soap sack will gently cleanse and exfoliate your skin and you can hang it up to dry in between washes pattern includes two options for finishing the opening edge ♥ pattern includes photos and written instructions ♥ all my patterns have been thoroughly tested by skilled makers yarn used for this project lightweight #3 yarn cotton kings cotton 8/8 100% cotton from www hobbii com yardage approx 41yds 38m of light weight yarn or 25g tools needed hook size usa 7 metric 4 5mm darning needle to weave in ends stitch marker optional scissors gauge / gauge worked in hhdc as pattern 5cm x 5cm 2in x 2in = 7 sts and 6 row finished size 3 75in 9 5cm width x 5 75in 14 5cm height the inspiration behind this pattern comes from s a c k s a c k supporting a community with kindness is a 501c3 nonprofit organization please visit https //www soapsacks com for more information © loopy handmade this pattern may not be copied shared resold or redistributed in any way thank you for your understanding however feel free to sell any finished items made from using this pattern but please give pattern credit to loopy handmade by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms above if you have any questions regarding my patterns i am always happy to help please contact me by email at loopyhandmade@gmail com connect with me instagram ♥ www instagram com/loopyhandmade facebook ♥ www facebook com/loopyhandmade pinterest ♥ www pinterest com/loopyhandmade website ♥ www loopyhandmade com i hope you love working with this pattern and love the finished product even more ♥ be inspired ♥ be creative ♥ be loopy
